text: for a lifetime of wickedness far too

of Hastings

for not giving him enough drugs
the second they say was directed

carlion people saw it is your hobby it's

now people don't believe Ivan or me life
they expect me to go out in the door on

they kind of feel more relaxed you know
people say you know what you call this
elf on some Kevlar which I'm me Kevin
believes that Hastings is indeed cursed
and he thinks that's because Crowley was
tapping into a supernatural power grid
made up of so-called ley lines if you
actually take a map of any region and
you look at the churches the standing
stones the holy Wells that the sacred
places from time immemorial you actually
find that they line up on what's said to
be a mystical straight line in other
words there's a power in those ley lines
and you can get places for example where
several ley lines can cross as a rule
Kevin thinks ley lines are full of
positive happy energy and that's a good
thing it's when these lines cross as
they do apparently in Hastings that the
problems start crossed ley lines
according to Kevin create black streams
these black streams are full of negative
energy and that's a bad thing
Kevin however is confident that his
